description: Numbers that are congruent to {2, 4, 5} mod 6.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x)*(x^2 + 2)/((1 + x + x^2)*(x - 1)^2), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 16 2014 *)
prog: (Haskell)a047261 n = a047261_list !! na047261_list = 2 : 4 : 5 : map (+ 6) a047261_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 19 2013, Jul 06 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 16 2014
